entries.title: That One Hard Drive
entries.content:
Last night I bought a hard drive for 300.00 pesos. I thought the deal
was too good so I made a conversation with the seller. Turns out it 
was defective. Now, he made arrangements again that he would replace
the defective hard drive, but again, it's still defective. I am now 
still waiting for his reply to replace me for a working one. I really
hope that it'll go well this time. 

My partner lent her money to me so that I could buy a new one. 
I just feel sad that the one I bought is defective. 
If anything goes bad, I'll go to a physical store tomorrow and buy
a really legit one. 

Will update!! :(
